remarks: The isomorphism H is order-preserving.  Part of proof after Lemma N of [Crawley] p. 122 line 6.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihord.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihord.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihord.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihord.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihord $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( I ` X ) C_ ( I ` Y ) <-> X .<_ Y ) ) $.
